entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
AREAS OF FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
AREAS OF FOG IN THE MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 90
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
